被细心温暖呵护的白人小孩的一生 😭 
不过不得不说这个连环画做得是真精美，像艺术品！

https://howtotalktowhitekidsaboutracism.com/

https://thedirectorsbureau.com/

虽然我并没有完全搞懂这个是怎么玩的，但是这个形式很不错， interesting ! 从 brunosimon 那里了解了不少 creative projects ，这个人... 先天 creative 圣体

Yesterday a guy from Reddit to exchange language added my instagram account, he asked me many questions about what kind of music I like, and let me to recommend some Chinese music to him. Maybe it's because I said I love listening music in my daily life

However I have to say that his avatar ( a green skull ) really scared me 🥹 , so I just recommended my favourite R&B singer — David Tao to him. Then, I said, " I'm so sorry but your avatar scared me so I have to say goodbye to you" and blocked his account.

I don't know whether I did right, maybe it's a nice guy maybe it's strange.....
